episodes.title: The next chapter of life 👊🏻 You CAN move on from the local church and live a great life ‼️
episodes.description:
Just some helpful tips on moving forward from the local churches and how to handle the change. It is possible to leave and have a great life. Don’t believe the lies the local churches have fed you. 

If you’d like to be interviewed for the podcast, and share your story to inspire others.. email me at stnding4thetruth@gmail.com 

#localchurch #livingstreamchurch #lordsrecovery #watchmannee #witnesslee

episodes.title: WHO WANTS TO SHARE THEIR STORY⁉️
episodes.description:
For all of you who have been a victim to this group, and have been silenced.. this is YOUR time to get your story out. To let you VOICE be heard. This channel has allowed me to heal from what I dealt with, and I know it can help you too. Let’s share YOUR story. I’m tired of people commenting on here saying “it’s not true” or “you’re lying”. For those of you who have been victims of this group, it’s time YOUR voice is heard and not hidden anymore. We can either do a podcast style interview (we can block out your face and change your voice), or I can read out loud an email you send an keep your name anonymous. I want your story to be heard. 🧡
Email: Stnding4theTruth@Gmail.Com
‼️DISCLAIMER‼️ I take your privacy VERY seriously. I will make sure your story is heard in a way that makes you the most comfortable.

episodes.title: Sexual abuse cover up within Living Stream Ministry/ Local Churches/Cult/Lords Recovery/Witness Lee
episodes.description:
*Trigger warning* 
For decades I have been hearing stories from the victims themselves.. I am not the only one to come forward about this subject and the things that go on within the group. You cannot silence these stories. When you do, it just causes more of these things to happen. If you are a victim of this group, I hope you have found help, or are willing to speak out.💙

My email is ritzsticks@yahoo.com

episodes.title: Helping a loved one who’s in the local churches
episodes.description:
I’ve received many emails, and a lot of them are friends or family trying to help loved ones see the local churches for what they really are. These stories break my heart. I wish I could say there’s one sure way to get them to see the truth, but this group is so powerful in their tactics that a lot of times, they have to come to the conclusion themselves.

My email is ritzsticks@yahoo.com if anyone wants to chat.

episodes.title: 34 years in the local churches/living stream ministry and I finally see the truth
episodes.description:
Whether you’re still in the group, just got out, or have just heard of it and want more information… this group is very deceitful and has done tremendous damage to people. Please listen with an open mind. This group HATES when people come out and say these things. They have damaged peoples lives who have spoken out. It’s time for change.

If you’d like to reach out: ritzsticks@yahoo.com

episodes.title: Thank you, from the bottom of my heart 💖
CHURCH KID TESTIMONIAL LIVING STREAM MINISTRY/THE LOCAL CHURCHES
